predicate.note: Frames file for 'laminate' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: passive
example.text: A four-page ad from Texas Instruments Inc., running in approximately 140,000 issues of the Oct. 20 ``Corporate Elite'' issue of the McGraw-Hill Inc. publication, contains a speech synthesizer laminated [*] between two of the pages.
